categories: Category:Articles known by rank or affiliation
Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: The apprentice of Overseer Ardran was a male Sith Pureblood during the Cold War. The Sith Lord Thrain viewed the Sith apprentice as having a privileged attitude on account of his being a pureblood, and Thrain's disapproval meant that the apprentice would likely never become a full Sith.
